RelatedSentence: One has to pay between Rs 1,000 and 5,000 , depending on the value of the land deal for early appointment , alleged Ashok Goyal , who led the protesters .

Prem Chand Gupta and Surjit Budhiraja alleged that the system of seeking prior appointment for registration of land deals was implemented in Ambala without any orders from the financial commissioner ( revenue ) .
The system of seeking appointments was being followed only in Gurgaon and Faridabad so why is it being enforced here in Ambala without official orders , both alleged .
